WE ARE

Goju Shin Ryu

With the modern day emphasis very much on the sporting and competition side of martial arts (and of course if this is what motivates and interests you then there is nothing wrong with that at all) THE SCHOOL OF TRADITIONAL MARTIAL ARTS offers a different path to physical, mental and spiritual fulfilment through the systematic study of traditional Goju Ryu Karate and or Jiu Jitsu.

Welcome to the beginning of a safer world.

OUR VALUE

Unleash Your Inner Warrior

Explore the fundamental principles that shape our training philosophy and embark on a transformative journey towards mastering the art of self-defense and self-discipline.

Our Vision

To create a world where individuals of all backgrounds feel strong, safe, and empowered. transformative journey towards mastering the art of self-defense and self-discipline.

Our Mission

To train and certify instructors globally in the art of Krav Maga for self-defense excellence. transformative journey towards mastering the art of self-defense and self-discipline.

Our Motto

Instilling strength, confidence, and protection through the power of Krav Maga training. transformative journey towards mastering the art of self-defense and self-discipline.
